21.title: Best and good practices
21.content: Please wach this video from . | Make frequent choices efficient . | Is component or variant used frequently? | Less clicks is more | . | Always favor usability (over maintenance) . | easy to use | designers should be aware what each component offers | make it hard to fo the wrong thing | . | Take away visual decisions . | Our answer: Design Tokens | . | Handle breaking changes in advance . | Figma usage: watch video | . | Bridge the gap . | Help developers to navigate to quickly get what they need | . | .

22.title: Design Checklist
22.content: When we add a new item to Pasta we’ll try to follow the checklist below. This has been inspired from Adobe Spectrum . |   |   | . | ☻ All interactive statesIncludes all interactive states that are applicable (hover, down, focus, keyboard focus, disabled). | ⃝ Usage guidelinesIncludes a list of dos and don’ts that highlight best practices and common mistakes. | . | ⃝ All color themesWorks properly across all four color themes (lightest, light, dark, darkest). | ☻ All platform scalesIncludes a desktop scale (UWP, macOS, web desktop) and a mobile scale (iOS, Android, web mobile). | . | ☻ Accessible use of colorColor is not used as the only visual means of conveying information (WCAG 2.0 1.4.1). | ⃝ Internationalization guidelinesWorks properly across various locales and includes guidelines for bi-directionality (RTL). | . | ☻ Accessible contrast for textText has a contrast ratio of at least 4.5:1 for small text and at least 3:1 for large text (WCAG 2.0 1.4.3). | ☻ Keyboard interactionsFollows WCAG 2.0 standards for keyboard accessibility guidelines and includes a description of the keyboard interactions. | . | ☻ Accessible contrast for UI componentsVisual information required to identify components and states (except inactive components) has a contrast ratio of at least 3:1 (WCAG 2.1 1.4.11). | ☻ Design tokensAll design attributes (color, typography, layout, animation, etc.) are available as design tokens. | . | ⃝ Content designUI language and information design considerations have been incorporated into component design. | ⃝ UI kitIncludes a downloadable XD file that shows multiple options, states, color themes, and platform scales. | . | ☻ Defined optionsIncludes relevant options (variant, style, size, orientation, optional iconography, decorations, selection, error state, etc.) | ⃝ Generated UI kitIncludes a link to Figma , generated by code using design tokens defined in Spectrum DNA, and shows multiple options, states, color themes, and platform scales. | . | ☻ Defined behaviorsIncludes guidelines for keyboard focus, layout (wrapping, truncation, overflow), animation, interactions, etc. | ☻ Writing guidelinesIncludes content standards or usage guidelines for how to write or format in-product content for the component. | .
